channel.title: Server runner?
channel.description: is it posible to get someone to run my server ( portfoward) for me coz im using a wireless thing and i cant connect my computer to the modem...? so if anyone can help me that would be awsum

item.title: Server runner?
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“bonza, post:1, topic:220314”]is it posible to get someone to run my server ( portfoward) for me coz im using a wireless thing and i cant connect my computer to the modem…? so if anyone can help me that would be awsum[/quote]That means you have no router and can’t portforward? You’re fine, no router means no need to portforward, but I recommend a router.
